original_title: Thomas mot Thomas (en sensasjonell teori om det ubetydelige livet i multiverset)
overview: A quantum physicist is about to have the breakthrough of the century, but as he closes in on his goal, versions of him from parallel realities force him to untangle the mystery of his own existence; how to be a present father for his son.
tagline: There's no Nobel Prize for father of the year
title: Thomas vs. Thomas (A Sensational Theory Regarding an Insignificant Life in the Multiverse)
